'Fauser 10' oder 'CALMA 29') }} !ISBN {{#info: ISBN (International Standard Book Number) eines Buches }} |- |{{#arraymap:{{#var:SiglumIdentifier}}|,|x1|[[SiglumIdentifier::x1]]|}} |[[Isbn::{{#var:Isbn}}]] |} [[Category:Collection]]

<includeonly> {{#sparql: PREFIX retmop: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/Property-3A> PREFIX page: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT * WHERE { } |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} </includeonly> <noinclude> [[Category:Query]] </noinclude>

<includeonly>
{{#sparql:
PREFIX retmop: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/Property-3A>
PREFIX retmoc: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/Category-3A>
PREFIX page: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?Erstellungsdaten WHERE 
{ 
    page:{{PAGENAMEE}} retmop:Has_subobject ?z .
    ?z rdf:type retmoc:Date
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:Date ?DateStart .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateCertain ?dc .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateVague ?dv .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateCertain ?dec .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateVague ?dev .}
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) .
    BIND (
        IF(
            ?DateCertain,
            CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))),
            CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)")
        ) as ?a
    ) .
    BIND (
        IF(
            ?DateEndCertain,
            CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))),
            CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)")
        ) as ?b
    ) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?a, " - ", ?b), ?a) as ?Erstellungsdaten) .
}
|chart=sgvizler.visualization.Table
|options=headings=false
}}
</includeonly>
<noinclude>
[[Category:Query]]
</noinclude>

Edierter Text {{#info: Der edierte Text eines mittelalterlichen Werkes }}

{|class="flextable" | {{EditionTypeQuery}} {|class="wikitable smwtable" !Editor {{#info: Ein Editor ist Bearbeiter einer Edition }} |{{#arraymap:{{{Editor|}}}|,|x1|
  • [[Editor::x1]]
  • |}} |- !Seitenbereich des edierten Texts {{#info: Angabe des Seitenbereichs des edierten Texts im publizierten Text }} |{{#if:{{{PageRangeOfEditedText|}}}|[[PageRangeOfEditedText::{{{PageRangeOfEditedText}}}]]}} |- !Ist Edition von {{#info: Zusammenhang zwischen ediertem Text und dem Werk }} |[[IsEditionOf::{{{IsEditionOf}}}|{{#getdisplaytitle:{{{IsEditionOf}}}}}]] |- !Ist Edition des Werkteils {{#info: Zusammenhang zwischen ediertem Text und dem Werkteil }} |{{#arraymap:{{{IsEditionOfWorkPart|}}}|,|x1|
  • [[IsEditionOfWorkPart::x1]]
  • |}} |- !Incipit {{#info: Incipit zur Identifikation eines Textes }} |{{#arraymap:{{{Incipit|}}}|,|x1|
  • [[Incipit::x1]]
  • |}} |- !Übersetzer {{#info: Übersetzer des Werks im Mittelalter }} |{{#arraymap:{{{Translator|}}}|,|x1|
  • [[Translator::x1]]
  • |}} |- !Sprache {{#info: Sprache des Werks oder des edierten Textes bzw. des übersetzten Textes in der Edition. Die Sprache sollte aus einem kontrollierten Vokabular wie den ISO-639-3-Ländercodes ausgewählt werden: http://www.lexvo.org/linkeddata/resources.html ISO-639-3 beinhaltet auch hsitorische Sprachen wie Mittelhochdeutsch (gmh) oder Altenglisch (ang) }} |{{#arraymap:{{{Language|}}}|,|x1|
  • [[Language::x1]]
  • |}} |- !Anmerkung zur Sprache {{#info: Anmerkung zur Sprache des Werks oder des edierten Textes und/oder des übersetzten Textes in der Edition (z.B. typographische Angaben wie 'lat./kroatisch in Synopse') }} |{{#if:{{{LanguageNote|}}}|[[LanguageNote::{{{LanguageNote}}}]]}} |- !Übersetzung von |{{#if:{{{IsTranslationOf|}}}|[[IsTranslationOf::{{{IsTranslationOf}}}]]}} |- !Anmerkung {{#info: Anmerkungen zu Datierung, Zuschreibung, etc }} ||{{#if:{{{Note|}}}|[[Note::{{{Note}}}]]|keine Anmerkung angegeben}} |} | {{#network: {{#ask: [[{{PAGENAMEE}}]] |format=array |link=none }} |class=network }} |} {{#sparql: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: SELECT (CONCAT('',?Shelfmark,'') as ?Manuskript) ?Bibliothek ?Standort ?Foliobereich ?Seitenbereich ?Anmerkung WHERE { page:{{PAGENAMEE}} retmop:Has_subobject ?Subobject . ?Subobject a retmoc:ManuscriptReference . ?Subobject retmop:ManuscriptReferenceCodex ?Manuscript . ?Manuscript retmop:Shelfmark ?Shelfmark . ?Manuscript retmop:HeldBy/rdfs:label ?Bibliothek . ?Manuscript retmop:Place ?Standort . OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:FolioRange ?Foliobereich .} OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:PageRange ?Seitenbereich .} OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:ManuscriptReferenceNote ?Anmerkung .} } ORDER BY ASC(?Shelfmark) |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} {{#if: {{{EditionTitle|}}}| {{#set:EditionTitle={{{EditionTitle}}}}} {{DISPLAYTITLE:{{{EditionTitle}}}}} }} {{#vardefine: Source|{{{Source|}}}}} {{#vardefine: Provenance|{{{Provenance|}}}}} [[Category:EditedText]] {| !Quelle {{#info: Quellen der integrierten Daten. In der Regel Angabe des Dateinamens der Quelldatei }} !Herkunft {{#info: Provenienz der integrierten Daten. Je nach Herkunft der Daten: 'ALCUIN', 'RETM2', oder 'RETM3' }} |- |[[Source::{{#var:source}}]] |[[Provenance::{{#var:provenance}}]] |}

<includeonly> {{#sparql: PREFIX retmop: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/Property-3A> PREFIX page: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT * WHERE { } |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} </includeonly> <noinclude> [[Category:Query]] </noinclude>

<includeonly>
{{#sparql:
PREFIX retmop: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/Property-3A>
PREFIX page: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?Editionsformen
WHERE {
    {
        ?Incorporates retmop:Incorporates page:{{PAGENAMEE}} .    
        ?Incorporates rdf:type/rdfs:label ?Editionsformen .    
    } UNION {
        page:{{PAGENAMEE}} retmop:IsTranslationOf ?IsTranslationOf .
        BIND(IF(BOUND(?IsTranslationOf), "Übersetzung", "") AS ?Editionsformen) .
    }    
}
|chart=sgvizler.visualization.Table
|options=headings=false
}}
</includeonly>
<noinclude>
[[Category:Query]]
</noinclude>

<includeonly>
{{#sparql:
PREFIX retmop: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/Property-3A>
PREFIX page: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?Datum WHERE 
{ 
    page:{{PAGENAMEE}} retmop:Has_subobject ?z .
    ?z retmop:EventType "{{{EventType}}}" .
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:Date ?DateStart .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateCertain ?dc .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateVague ?dv .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateCertain ?dec .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateVague ?dev .}
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) .
    BIND (
        IF(
            ?DateCertain,
            CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))),
            CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)")
        ) as ?a
    ) .
    BIND (
        IF(
            ?DateEndCertain,
            CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))),
            CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)")
        ) as ?b
    ) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?a, " - ", ?b), ?a) as ?Datum) .
}
|chart=sgvizler.visualization.Table
|options=headings=false
}}
</includeonly>
<noinclude>
[[Category:Query]]
</noinclude>

Inkunabel {{#info: Wiegenkatalog-Nummerierung eines Wiegendruckes (Inkunabel). Inkunabeln/Wiegendrucke wurden zwischen 1454 (Druck der Gutenberg-Bibel) und dem 31. Dezember 1500 gedruckt. Die Katalognummern kommen meist aus dem Repertorium bibliographicum von Hain (z.B. 'Hain 487'), dem Gesamtkatalog der Wiegendrucke (GW), oder auch den Ergänzungen von Copinger (z.B. 'Copinger 615'). Siehe auch folgende Webseite mit einer tabellarischen Übersicht typischer Muster der Signaturen von Wiegendrucken: https://www.cerl.org/help/incunabula/shelfmark_patterns }}

Zeitschrift {{#info: Eine wissenschaftliche Zeitschrift }}

{{#sparql: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX page: SELECT (CONCAT('',?Title,'') as ?Publikation) ?Zitationsangabe ?Anmerkung WHERE { page:{{PAGENAMEE}} retmop:Has_subobject ?Subobject . ?Subobject a retmoc:LiteratureReference . ?Subobject retmop:LiteratureReferencePublication ?Publication . ?Publication retmop:Title ?Title . OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:LiteratureReferenceCitation ?Zitationsangabe .} OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:LiteratureReferenceNote ?Anmerkung .} } ORDER BY ASC(?Title) |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} [[Category:Query]]

{{#subobject:
    |LiteratureReferencePublication={{{LiteratureReferencePublication|}}}
    |LiteratureReferenceNote={{{LiteratureReferenceNote|}}}
    |LiteratureReferenceCitation={{{LiteratureReferenceCitation|}}}
    |@category=LiteratureReference
}}
</includeonly>

{{#if: {{{EditedText|}}}| {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (CONCAT('',SAMPLE(?Title),'') as ?Edierter_Text) (GROUP_CONCAT(?Incipt) AS ?Incipite) WHERE { ?Page rdf:type retmoc:EditedText . ?Page retmop:EditionTitle ?Title filter contains(lcase(?Title), lcase("{{{EditedText}}}") ) . OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Incipit ?Incipit } } GROUP BY ?Page ORDER BY ASC(?Title) |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} |}} [[Category:Query]]

{{#if: {{{Journal|}}}| {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: SELECT (CONCAT('',SAMPLE(?Title),'') as ?Zeitschrift) (SAMPLE(?JournalAbbreviation) AS ?Zeitschriftkürzel) (SAMPLE(?JournalSubtitle) AS ?Untertitel) WHERE { ?Page a retmoc:Journal . ?Page retmop:JournalTitle{{!}}retmop:JournalAbbreviation{{!}}retmop:JournalSubtitle ?a filter contains(lcase(?a), lcase("{{{Journal}}}") ) . ?Page retmop:JournalTitle ?Title . OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:JournalAbbreviation ?JournalAbbreviation } . OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:JournalSubtitle ?JournalSubtitle } . } GROUP BY ?Page ORDER BY ASC(?Title) |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} |}} [[Category:Query]]

{{#if: {{{Organization|}}}| {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdf: PREFIX rdfs: SELECT (SAMPLE(?Type) AS ?Typ) (CONCAT('',SAMPLE(?Title),'') as ?Organisation) (SAMPLE(?OrganizationAbbreviation) AS ?Organisationskürzel) WHERE { ?Page rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf retmoc:Organization . ?Page retmop:OrganizationName{{!}}retmop:OrganizationAbbreviation ?a filter contains(lcase(?a), lcase("{{{Organization}}}") ) . ?Page retmop:OrganizationName ?Title . OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:OrganizationAbbreviation ?OrganizationAbbreviation } ?Page a/rdfs:label ?Type } GROUP BY ?Page ORDER BY ASC(?Title) |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} |}} [[Category:Query]]

{{#if: {{{Person|}}}| {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (CONCAT('',SAMPLE(?Label),'') as ?Person) (SAMPLE(?Birthdate) as ?Geburt) (SAMPLE(?Deathdate) as ?Tod) (CONCAT('
    ', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Synonym), '
') AS ?Synonyme) (CONCAT('
    ', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Works), '
') AS ?Werke) WHERE { ?Page rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf retmoc:Person . ?Page retmop:Name{{!}}retmop:VariantName ?a filter contains(lcase(?a), lcase("{{{Person}}}") ) . ?Page rdfs:label ?Label . OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:VariantName ?VariantName . BIND(IF(BOUND(?VariantName), CONCAT('
  • ', ?VariantName, '
    • '), "") AS ?Synonym) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?Event . OPTIONAL { ?Event retmop:EventType "Geburt" . ?Event retmop:Date ?DateStart . OPTIONAL {?Event retmop:DateCertain ?DateCertain .} OPTIONAL {?Event retmop:DateVague ?DateVague .} BIND ( IF( ?DateCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))), CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), "?") ) as ?Birthdate ) . } OPTIONAL { ?Event retmop:EventType "Tod" . ?Event retmop:Date ?DateStart . OPTIONAL {?Event retmop:DateCertain ?DateCertain .} OPTIONAL {?Event retmop:DateVague ?DateVague .} BIND ( IF( ?DateCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))), CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), "?") ) as ?Deathdate ) . } } OPTIONAL { SELECT (CONCAT( '
  • ', SAMPLE(?Worktitle), '
      ', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?WorkAlternateTitles), GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Incipits), '
    • ' ) as ?Works) ?Page WHERE { ?WorkPage retmop:Has_subobject/retmop:WorkCreator ?Page . ?WorkPage retmop:Title ?Worktitle . OPTIONAL {?WorkPage retmop:AlternateTitle ?WorkAlternateTitle .} OPTIONAL {?WorkPage retmop:Incipit ?Incipit .} BIND(IF(BOUND(?WorkAlternateTitle), CONCAT('
  • ', ?WorkAlternateTitle, '
    • '), "") AS ?WorkAlternateTitles) . BIND(IF(BOUND(?Incipit), CONCAT('
  • ', ?Incipit, '
    • '), "") AS ?Incipits) . } GROUP BY ?WorkPage ?Page } } GROUP BY ?Page ORDER BY ASC(?Label) |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} |}}     [[Category:Query]]

{{#if: {{{Publication|}}}| {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdf: PREFIX rdfs: SELECT (SAMPLE(?Type) AS ?Typ) (CONCAT('',SAMPLE(?Title),'') as ?Publikation) (SAMPLE(?Subtitle) AS ?Untertitel) WHERE { ?Page a/rdfs:subClassOf retmoc:Publication . ?Page retmop:Title{{!}}retmop:Subtitle ?a filter contains(lcase(?a), lcase("{{{Publication}}}") ) . ?Page retmop:Title ?Title . OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Subtitle ?Subtitle } . ?Page a/rdfs:label ?Type } GROUP BY ?Page ORDER BY ASC(?Title) |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} |}} [[Category:Query]]

{{#if: {{{Series|}}}| {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: SELECT (CONCAT('',SAMPLE(?Title),'') as ?Reihe) (SAMPLE(?SeriesAbbreviation) AS ?Reihenkürzel) WHERE { ?Page a/rdfs:subClassOf{{!}}a retmoc:Series . ?Page retmop:SeriesTitle{{!}}retmop:SeriesAbbreviation ?a filter contains(lcase(?a), lcase("{{{Series}}}") ) . ?Page retmop:SeriesTitle ?Title . OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:SeriesAbbreviation ?SeriesAbbreviation } . } GROUP BY ?Page ORDER BY ASC(?Title) |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} |}} [[Category:Query]]

{{#if: {{{Work|}}}| {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (CONCAT('',SAMPLE(?Title),'') as ?Werk) (CONCAT('
    ', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Titelvariante), '
') AS ?Titelvarianten) (SAMPLE(?Worktype) AS ?Werktyp) (GROUP_CONCAT(?Incipt) AS ?Incipite) WHERE { ?Page rdf:type retmoc:Work . ?Page retmop:AlternateTitle{{!}}retmop:Title ?a filter contains(lcase(?a), lcase("{{{Work}}}") ) . ?Page retmop:Title ?Title OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:AlternateTitle ?AlternateTitle . BIND(IF(BOUND(?AlternateTitle), CONCAT('
  • ', ?AlternateTitle, '
    • '), "") AS ?Titelvariante) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:WorkType ?Worktype } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Incipit ?Incipit } } GROUP BY ?Page ORDER BY ASC(?Title) |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} |}}     [[Category:Query]]

Manuskript {{#info: Ein Manuskript ist eine unikale Manifestation des Textes eines oder mehrerer Werke. Typischerweise ist die Zitationsangabe zu einem Manuskript ist wie folgt strukturiert: Ort, Bibliothek/Archiv, Signatur, ggf. Folio-Angaben }}

In der Regel Angabe des Dateinamens der Quelldatei }} !Herkunft {{#info: Provenienz der integrierten Daten. Je nach Herkunft der Daten: 'ALCUIN', 'RETM2', oder 'RETM3' }} !HCS-ID {{#info: ID des Eintrags im Handschriftencensus (HCS) }} |- |[[Source::{{#var:Source}}]] |[[Provenance::{{#var:Provenance}}]] |[[HcsIdentifier::{{#var:HcsIdentifier}}]] |}

Arabisch). OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:FolioRange ?Foliobereich .} OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:PageRange ?Seitenbereich .} OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:ManuscriptReferenceNote ?Anmerkung .} } ORDER BY ASC(?Shelfmark) |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} {{LiteratureReferenceQuery}} {{#network: {{#ask: [[{{PAGENAMEE}}]] |format=array |link=none }} |class=network }} {{#vardefine: Source|{{{Source|}}}}} {{#vardefine: SiglumIdentifier|{{{SiglumIdentifier|}}}}} {{#vardefine: Provenance|{{{Provenance|}}}}} {{#vardefine: Retm2Identifier|{{{Retm2Identifier|}}}}} {{#arraymap:{{{AlternateTitle|}}}|,|x1|{{#set:AlternateTitle=x1}}}} {{#set:Title={{{Title}}}}} {{DISPLAYTITLE:{{{Title}}}}} [[Category:Work]] {| !Siglum {{#info: Siglum eines Werks (z.B.
